divy33:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṁ viharati sma jetavane ’nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
divy33:9: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ mahānagarīṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy33:10: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyo yenānyatamamudapānaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy33:11: tena khalu samayena tasminnudapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅgadārikā udakamuddharate sma |
divy33:12: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṁ mātaṅgadārikāmetadavocat—dehi me bhagini pānīyam, pāsyāmi |
divy33:14: nāhaṁ te bhagini kulaṁ vā jātiṁ vā pṛcchāmi |
divy33:15: api tu sacette parityaktaṁ pānīyam, dehi, pāsyāmi |
divy33:19: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā athāyuṣmata ānandasya śarīre mukhe svare ca sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittamudgṛhītvā yoniśomanasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṁrāgacittamutpādayati sma—āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī syāditi |
divy33:22: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pānīyaghaṭamādāya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṁ tenopasaṁkramya pānīyaghaṭamekānte nikṣipya svāṁ jananīmidamavocat—yatkhalu evamamba jānīyāh—ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇagautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakaḥ |
divy33:24: śakṣyasi tamamba ānayitum? sā tāmavocat—śaktāhaṁ putri ānandamānayituṁ sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syādyo vā vītarāgaḥ |
divy33:26: rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇagautamamatīva sevate bhajate paryupāsane |
divy33:30: evamuktā prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā mātaramidamavocat—sacedadamba śramaṇo gautamo vītarāgaḥ, tasyāntikācchramaṇamānandaṁ na pratilapsye, jīvitaṁ parityajeyam |
divy33:35: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṁ kṛtvā vedīmālipya darbhān saṁstīrya agniṁ pajvālya aṣṭaśatamarkapuṣpāṇāṁ gṛhītvā mantrānāvartayamānā ekaikamarkapuṣpaṁ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma |
divy33:36: tatreyaṁ vidyā bhavati— amale vimale kuṅkume sumane |
divy33:39: vismayaṁ mahārājasya samabhivardhayituṁ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyaḥ śikhigrahā devā viśikhigrahā devā ānandasyāgamanāya saṁgamanāya kramaṇāya grāṇāya juhomi svāhā |
divy33:41: sa vihārānniṣkramya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṁ tenopasaṁkrāmati sma |
divy33:43: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṁ duhitaramidamavocat—ayamasau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati |
divy33:45: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā pramuditamanā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṁ prajñapayati sma |
divy33:58: ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca (1)|
divy33:64: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṁ jananīmidamavocat—ayamasau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati |
divy33:65: tāmāha mātā—niyataṁ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati |
divy33:67: prakṛtirāha—kiṁ punaramba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā nāsmākam? tāmāha mātā—balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā nāsmākam |
divy33:68: ye putri mantrāḥ sarvalokasya prabhavanti, tān mantrāñ śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti |
divy33:69: na punarlokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantum |
divy33:75: dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṁ bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṁ hitāya sukhāya |
divy33:76: iyamānanda ṣaḍakṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyaksambuddhairbhāṣitā, caturbhiśca mahārājaiḥ, śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa, brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā |
divy33:78: tvamapyetarhi ānanda tāṁ dhārasya vācaya paryavāpnuhi |
divy33:79: yaduta tadyathā— aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre ’rcihaste kharagrīve bandhumati vīramati dhara vidha cilimile vilo:aya viṣāṇi loke |
divy33:81: golamati gaṇḍavile cilimile sātiniṁne yathāsaṁvibhakte golamati gaṇḍavilāyai svāhā |
divy33:83: yaḥ kaścidānanda ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṁ svastyayanaṁ kuryāt, sa yadi vadhārho bhavet, daṇḍena mucyate, daṇḍārhaḥ prahāreṇa, prahārārhaḥ, paribhāṣaṇayā, paribhāṣaṇārho romaharṣaṇena, romaharṣaṇārhaḥ punareva mucyate |
divy33:84: nāhamānanda taṁ samanupaśyāmi sadevaloke samāraloke sabrahmaloke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṁ prajāyāṁ sadevamānuṣikāyāṁ sāsurāyām yastvanayā ṣaḍkṣaryā vidyayā rakṣāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ rakṣāsūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte abhibhavituṁ śaknoti varjayitvā paurāṇaṁ karmavipākam |
divy33:86: atha prakṛtirmāraṅgadārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥsnātā anāhatadūṣyaprāvṛtā muktāmālyābharaṇā yena śrāvastī nagarī tenopasaṁkramya nagaradvāre kapāṭamūle niśrityāsthādāyuṣmantamānandamāgamayamānā—niyatamanena mārgeṇa ānando ānando bhikṣurāgamiṣyatīti |
divy33:87: dadarśāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṁ mātaṅgadārikāṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhām |
divy33:88: dṛṣṭvā ca punarjehrīyamāṇarūpo ’pragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṁ śīghraṁ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy33:90: ekāntasthita āyucmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat—iyaṁ me bhagavan prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantamanu gacchati, tiṣṭhantamanu tiṣṭhati |
divy33:91: yadyadeva kulaṁ pinṇḍāya praviśāmi, tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati |
divy33:92: trāhi me bhagavan, trāhi me sugata |
divy33:93: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamidamavocat—kiṁ te prakṛte mātaṅgadārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā? prakṛtirāha—svāminaṁ bhadanta ānandamicchāmi |
divy33:94: bhagavānāha—anujñātāsi prakṛte mātāpitṛbhyāmānandāya? anujñātāsmi bhagavan, anujñātāsmi sugata |
divy33:96: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntā |
divy33:98: upasaṁkramya mātāpitroḥ pādāñ śirasā vanditvā ekānte ’sthāt |
divy33:99: ekāntasthitā svakau mātāpitarāvidamavocat—saṁmukhaṁ me amba tāta śramaṇasya gautamasya ānandāya utsṛjatam |
divy33:100: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtimādāyā yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntau |
divy33:101: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte ’sthāt |
divy33:103: atha bhagavān prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarāvidamavocat—anujñātā yuvābhyāṁ prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā ānandāyeti? tāvāhatuh—anujñātā bhagavan, anujñātā sugata |
divy33:104: tena hi yūyaṁ prakṛtimapahāya gacchata svagṛham |
divy33:105: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato ’ntikātprakrāntau |
divy33:107: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarāvaciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṁ mātaṅgadārikāmidamavocat—arthikāsi prakṛte ānandena bhikṣūṇā? prakṛtirāha—arthikāsmi bhagavan, arthikāsmi sugata |
divy33:108: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veṣaḥ, sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ |
divy33:110: pravrajayatu māṁ sugata, pravrajayatu māṁ bhagavān |
divy33:111: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṁ mātaṅgadārikāmidamavocat—ehi tvaṁ bhikṣuṇī, cara brahmacaryam |
divy33:113: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṁ mātaṅgadārikāmehibhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati sma, samādāpayati sma, smuttejayati sma, saṁpraharṣayati sma |
divy33:114: yeyaṁ kathā dīrgharātraṁ saṁsārasamāpannānāṁ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā, tadyathā—dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmeṣvādīnavaṁ niḥsaraṇaṁ bhayaṁ saṁkleśavyavadānam, bodhipakṣāṁstān dharmān bhagavān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṁprakāśayati sma |
divy33:115: atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśitā samādāpitā samuttejitā saṁpraharṣitā hṛṣṭacittā kalyāṇacittāa muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittākhilacittā bhavyā dharmadeśitamājñātum |
divy33:116: yadā ca bhagavāñ jñātaḥ prakṛtiṁ bhikṣuṇīṁ hṛṣṭacittāṁ kalyāṇacittāṁ muditacittāṁ vinīvaraṇacittāṁ bhavyāṁ pratibalāṁ sāmutkarṣikīṁ dharmadeśanāmājñātum, tadā yeyaṁ bhagavatāṁ buddhānāṁ caturāyasatyaprativedhikī dhrmadeśanā, yaduta duḥkhaṁ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ, tāṁ bhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṁprakāśayati sma |
divy33:117: atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturāyasatyānyabhijñātāsīt, duḥkhaṁ samudayaṁ nirodhaṁ mārgam |
divy33:118: tadyathā vastramapagatakālakaṁ rajanopagataṁ raṅgodake prakṣiptaṁ samyageva raṅgaṁ pratigṛhṇīyāt, evameva prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturāyasatyāni abhisamayati sma, tadyathā—duḥkhaṁ samudayaṁ nirodhaṁ mārgam |
divy33:120: atha praṛtirbhikṣuṇī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā akopyadharmā paryavasitadharmā adhigatārthalābhasaṁvṛttā tīrṇakāṅkṣāvicikitsā vigatakathaṁkathā vaiśāradyaprāptā aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane anudharmacāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantamidamavocat—atyayo me bhagvan, atyayo me sugata |
divy33:121: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣṭrajñajātīyā, yāhamānandaṁ bhikṣuṁ svāmivādena samudācārṣam |
divy33:126: atastasyā mama bhagavann atyayamatyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu anukampāmupādāya |
divy33:127: bhagavānāha—āyatyāṁ saṁvarāya sthitvā tvaṁ prakṛte atyayamatyayato ’dhyāgamaḥ |
divy33:128: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣprajñajātīyā tvamānandaṁ bhikṣuṁ svāmivādena samudācarasīti |
divy33:129: yataśca tvaṁ prakṛte atyayaṁ jānāsi, atyayaṁ paśyasi, āyatyāṁ ca saṁvaramāpadyase, ahamapi te ’tyayamatyayato gṛhṇāmi |
divy33:130: vṛddhireva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalānāṁ dharmāṇām, na hāniḥ |
divy33:131: atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatābhinanditānuśiṣṭā ekā vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinī smṛtimatī saṁprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati sma |
divy33:132: yadarthaṁ kuladuhitaraḥ keśānavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṁ pravrajanti, tadanuttarabrahmacaryaparyavasānaṁ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣākṛtyopasampadya pravedayate sma—kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṁ brahmacaryam, kṛtaṁ karaṇīyam, nāparamasmādbhavaṁ prajānāmīti |
divy33:134: aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah—bhagavatā kila caṇḍāladārikā pravrājiteti |
divy33:135: śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyanti—kathaṁ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā bhikṣūṇāṁ samyakcaryāṁ cariṣyati? bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṁ samyakcaryāṁ cariṣyati? kathaṁ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā brahmakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu pravekṣyati? aśrauṣīdrājā prasenajitkauśalah—bhagavatā caṇḍāladārikā pravrajiteti |
divy33:136: śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyati—kathaṁ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā bhikṣūṇāṁ samyakcaryāṁ cariṣyati? bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupādikānāṁ samyakcaryāṁ cariṣyati? kathaṁ brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu pravekṣyati? vimṛśya ca bhadram yānam yojayitvā bhadram yānamabhiruhya saṁbahulaiśca śrāvasteyairbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma |
divy33:138: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmiḥ, tāvadyānena gatvāṁ sa yānādavatīrya pattikāyaparivṛtaḥ pattikāyapuraskṛtaḥ padbhyāmevārāmaṁ pravikṣat |
divy33:140: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy33:141: te ’pi saṁbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy33:142: apyaikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṁ saṁmukhaṁ saṁrañjanīṁ saṁmodinīṁ vividhāṁ kathāṁ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy33:143: apyaikatyā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svakasvakāni mātāpaitṛkāṇi nāmagotrāṇi nāmagotrāṇi anuśrāvya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy33:144: apyaikatyā yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy33:147: atha bhagavān rājānaṁ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamārabhya teṣāṁ ca saṁbahulānāṁ śrāvasteyakānāṁ brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatīnāṁ cetasā cittamājñāya prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—icchatha yūyaṁ bhikṣavastathāgatasya saṁmukhaṁ prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṁ śrotum? bhikṣavo bhagavantamāhuh—etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayaḥ, yadbhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṁ kathayet, yadbhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti |
divy33:148: bhagavānāha—tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta, bhāṣiṣye |
divy33:149: evaṁ sādhu bhagavanniti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ |
divy33:150: bhagavāṁstānidamavocat— bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’tīte ’dhvani gaṅgātaṭe atimuktakadalīpāṭalakāmalakīvanagahanapradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājāḥ prativasati sma saṁbahulaiśca mātaṅgasahasraiḥ sārdham |
divy33:151: sa punaribhikṣavastriśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ pūrvajanmādhītān vedān smanusmarati sma sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān sākṣaraprabhedānitihāsapañcamān, anyāni ca śāstrāṇi padakośo? vaiyākaraṇo lokāyate yajñamantre mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣaḥ |
divy33:152: bhāṣyaṁ ca yathādharmaṁ vedavratapadānyanuśrutaṁ ca bhāṣate sma |
divy33:154: rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca sarvaguṇaiścopeto ’bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ |
divy33:155: atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ śārdūlakarṇaṁ kumāraṁ pūrvajanmādhītān vedānadhyāpayati sma yaduta sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān sākṣaraprabhedānitihāsapañcamānm, anyāni ca śāstrāṇi, bhāṣyaṁ ca yathādharmaṁ vedavratapadāni |
divy33:157: atha triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasyaitadabhavat—ayaṁ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumārah upeto rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca, sarvaguṇopetp^bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ, paramayā ca varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ |
divy33:160: tatkuto nvahaṁ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṁ guṇavatīṁ rūpavatīṁ pratirūpāṁ prajāvatīṁ labheyamiti? tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṁ nāma droṇamukhaṁ paribhuṅkte sma sasaptotsadaṁ stṛṇakāṣṭhodakaṁ dhānyasahagataṁ rājñāgnidattena brahmadeyaṁ dattam |
divy33:161: puṣkarasārī punarbrāhmaṇa upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṁśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanā kule jātyāṁ vā kṣipto jātivādena gotravādena yāvadāsaptamamātāmahapitāmaham |
divy33:162: yugapadupādhyāyo ’dhyāpako mantradharastrayāṇāṁ vedānāṁ pāragaḥ sāṅgopāṅgānāṁ sarahasyānāṁ sanighaṇṭakeiṭabhānāṁ sākṣaraprabhedānāmitihāsapañcamānāṁ padakośo vaiyākaraṇaḥ |
divy33:165: puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā |
divy33:166: upetā rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca, sarvaguṇopetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī |

divy33:432: idaṁ punarvacanaṁ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājāsya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat—kiṁ punarbhavatā ṛgvedo ’dhītaḥ, yajurvedo ’dhītaḥ, sāmavedo ’dhītaḥ, arthavavedo ’dhītaḥ, āyurvedo ’dhītaḥ, kalpādhyāyo ’pi, adhyātmamapi, mṛgacakraṁ vā, nakṣatragaṇo vā, tithikramagaṇo vā tvayādhītah? karmacakraṁ vā tvayādhigatam? athavā aṅgavidyā vā vastravidyā vā śivāvidyā śakunividyā vā tvayādhītā? athavā rāhucaritaṁ vā śukracaritaṁ vā grahacaritaṁ tvayādhītam? athavā lokāyataṁ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṁ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītah? evamukte triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṁ brāhmaṇametadavocat—etacca mayā brāhmaṇā adhītaṁ bhūyaścottaram |
divy33:434: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṁ syāt—ahamasmi mantreṣu pāraṁ prāpta iti, tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṁ pravakṣyāmi |
divy33:435: na khalvevaṁ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṁ sattvānāmetadabhavat—yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā |
divy33:438: atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṁ cobhayathā sadṛśānāṁ tato ’nye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā, te ’mī kṣatriyā iti saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:439: athātra brāhmaṇa tadanyatamānāṁ sattvānāmetadabhavat—parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ |
divy33:440: yannu vayaṁ svaparigrahamapahāya araṇyāyatanaṁ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṁhṛtya tṛṇakuṭikāṁ vā parṇakuṭikāṁ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyema iti |
divy33:441: atha te sattvāstaṁ parigrahamapahāyā araṇyāyatanaṁ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapālāśakaistṛṇakuṭiṁ vā parṇakuṭikāṁ vā kṛtvā tatraiva praviśya dhyāyanti sma |
divy33:442: te tatra sāyamāsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṁ prātaraśanahetośca grāmaṁ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma |
divy33:444: atha teṣāṁ grāmavāsināṁ satvānāmetadabhavat—duṣkarakārakā bata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṁ parigrahamutsṛjya grāmanigamajanapadebhyo bahir nirgatāḥ |
divy33:445: teṣāṁ bahirmanaskā brāhmaṇā iti saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:446: te ca punargrāmavāsinaḥ sattvāstānatīva satkurvanti sma |
divy33:449: atha etṣāmeva sattvānāmanyatame sattvāstāni dhyānānyasambhāvayanto grāmeṣvavatīrya mantrapadān svādhyāyanti sma |
divy33:450: tāṁste grāmanivāsina āhuh—na kevalamime sattvāḥ, ime ’dhyāpakāḥ, teṣāmadhyāpakā iti loke saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:451: ayaṁ heturayaṁ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṁ loke prādurbhāvāya |
divy33:453: athānyatame sattvā vivekakālapratisamyuktān kārmāntān vividhānarthapratisamyuktān kurvanti sma |
divy33:456: athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṁ kalpayanti sma |
divy33:459: bhūtapūrvaṁ brāhmaṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūmādāya rathamāruhya anyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe gataḥ |
divy33:461: tasmānmātaṅgam mā tvaṁ gāmah iti saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:463: kṣetraṁ karṣanti ye teṣāṁ karṣakā iti saṁjñā pravṛttā |
divy33:465: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṁ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlavratasamācāreṇa samyak, tasya rājā iti saṁjñābhūt |
divy33:467: tato ’nye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṁ kalpayanti, teṣāṁ vaṇija iti saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:470: pravrajitvā parāñ jayanti kleśāñ jayantīti teṣāṁ pravrajitā iti loke saṁjñā udapādi |
divy33:472: api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṁjñā loka udapādi |
divy33:473: tāṁ te pravakṣyāmi— brahmā loke ’sminn imān vedān vācayati |
divy33:495: tadyathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahmasamā mahāsamā mahāyāgikāḥ sātyamugrāḥ samantavedāḥ |
divy33:508: ete brāhmaṇā ekaviṁśatyadhvaryavo bhūtvā ekottaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ |
divy33:509: tadyathā kaṭhāḥ kaṇimā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ praṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ |
divy33:527: anumānamapi brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṁ pratītya etāni dvādaśabhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāśca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ pauraṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ |
divy33:528: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokayate vā padamīmāṁsāyāṁ vā |
divy33:531: tatte brāhmaṇa bravīmi—saṁjñāmātrakametallokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaśya iti vā śūdra iti vā |
divy33:533: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṁ duhitamutsṛja bhāryārthāya |
divy33:536: idaṁ punarvacanaṁ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho ’dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo ’sthāt |

divy33:539: dṛṣṭvā ca punaridamabravīt—yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṁ syādasadṛśena saha saṁbandho bhaviṣyatīti |
divy33:541: tatkasya hetoh? ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlaprajñādayo guṇā agryā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṁvidyante |
divy33:542: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṁ syāt—ye vājapeyam yajñam yajanti, aśvamedhaṁ puruṣamedhaṁ śāmyaprāśaṁ nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti, sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyanta iti |
divy33:544: tatkasya hetoh? vājapeyaṁ brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānā aśvamedhaṁ puruṣamedhaṁ śāmyaprāśaṁ nirargaḍam yajña ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṁsāṁ ca pravartayanti |
divy33:545: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi—na hyeṣa mārgaḥ svargāya |
divy33:546: ahaṁ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṁ svargāya vyākhyāmi |
divy33:547: tacchṛṇu— śīlaṁ rakṣeta medhāvī prārthayānaḥ sukhatrayam |
divy33:548: praśaṁsāṁ vittalābhaṁ ca pratya svarge ca modanam (70)|
divy33:549: yairbrāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṁ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ, yairaśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣamedho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ, parigṛhītastair nirargalaṁ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ |
divy33:551: ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ paścādvājapeyam yajñam yakṣyanti, ye ’śvamedham ye śāmyaprāśaṁ nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti, te nirarthakaṁ mahāvighātaṁ samyokṣyanti |
divy33:552: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi—ehi tvaṁ mayā sārdhaṁ saṁbandham yojanayasva |
divy33:553: tatkasya hetoh? dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti |
divy33:555: śraddhā śīlaṁ tapastyāgaḥ śrutirjñānaṁ dayaiva ca |
divy33:561: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante |
divy33:572: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṁ sapta gautrāṇi svākhyāsyāmi, tāni śrūyantām—tadyathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kāśyapā vāsiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ityetāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi |
divy33:574: atra ye gautamāste kauthumāste gagarste bhāradvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇāste vaikhānasāste vajrapādāḥ |
divy33:575: tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāste maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste bahujātāḥ |
divy33:576: tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāsta maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste salīlāste bahujātāḥ |
divy33:577: tatra ye kautsāste maudgalyāyanāste gauṇāyanāste lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste somabhuvāhvah |

divy33:580: tatra ye kāśyapāste maṇḍanāsta iṣṭāste śauṇḍāyanāste rocaneyāste ’napekṣāste ’gniveśyāḥ |
divy33:581: tatra ye kāśyapāste jātukarṇyāste dhānyāyanāste pārāśarāste vyāghranakhāste āṇḍāyanāsta aupamanyavāḥ |
divy33:582: tatra ye māṇḍavyāste bhāṇḍāyanāste dhomrāyaṇāste kātyāyanāste khalvavāahanāste sugandhārāyaṇāste kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ |
divy33:583: ityetāni brāhmaṇa evamekonapañcāśadgotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni cchandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṁsāyām |
divy33:584: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni |

divy33:602: bhavette bhavinī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate (75)|
divy33:603: yadi tāvadayaṁ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam |
divy33:605: atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā vā punaḥ |

divy33:607: na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī |

divy33:615: manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṁkarī |

divy33:625: na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṁ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi (86)|

divy33:634: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṁjñāmātrakamidaṁ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā |

divy33:660: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin, sotpattikāṁ sāvitrīṁ pravakṣyāmi |
divy33:663: bhūtapūrvaṁ brāhmaṇa atīte ’dhvani vasur nāma ṛṣirbabhūva |
divy33:665: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsaditā bhāryārtham |

divy33:672: iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñānaśodhanārthamimameva mantraṁ sa brāhmaṇo divārātraṁ japati sma |
divy33:686: kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṁ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ |
divy33:687: tasmādbhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmāṁs tato ’tulaṁ prāpsyatha brahmalokam (91)|
divy33:688: itīyaṁ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā, pūrvakaiśca samyaksambuddhairabhyanumoditā |

divy33:704: itīmāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrvadvārakāṇi |

divy33:3709: śrutvā mlānaṁ ca śuṣkaṁ ca mandavṛṣṭiṁ ca nirdiśet |
divy33:3711: nīyamānaṁ ca yad bījaṁ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ |
divy33:3712: svayameva tu tacchasyaṁ kāmaṁ kālena bhujyate (993)|
divy33:3713: nīyamānaṁ ca yad bījaṁ kampate yadi medinī |
divy33:3714: bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānānna tacchakyaṁ tu vāpitum (994)|
divy33:3725: pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṁ kurvanti saṁcayam |
divy33:3726: suvṛṣṭiṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṁpadā (1000)|
divy33:3727: haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṁ tṛṇe śasyāpahā api |
divy33:3728: parasparaṁ ca hiṁsanti dhānyaṁ ca nidhanaṁ vrajet (1001)|
divy33:3730: dṛṣṭvā tu saṁcayaṁ niṁne ’nāvṛṣṭiṁ ca nirdiśet (1002)|
divy33:3731: yadā tu preṣitaṁ bījaṁ saptarātreṇa jāyate |
divy33:3732: suvṛṣṭiṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca sarvaśasyeṣu saṁpadā (1003)|
divy33:3734: alpaṁ niṣpadyate śasyaṁ durbhikṣaṁ cātra jāyate (1004)|
divy33:3737: luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta nava tathā |
divy33:3738: suvṛṣṭiṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṁpadā (1006)|
divy33:3740: alpaṁ niṣpadyate śasyaṁ durbhikṣaṁ cātra nirdiśet (1007)|
divy33:3741: luṅgasya yadi pādāstu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit |
divy33:3744: yadā pūrvamukhī luṅgā kṣemaṁ vṛṣṭiṁ ca nirdiśet |
divy33:3745: yadā paścānmukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṁ ca nirdiśet (1009)|
divy33:3750: yadā nāgamukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kvacit |
divy33:3756: dharmamarthaṁ tathā kāmaṁ sarvaṁ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ (1014)|
divy33:3759: punarapi puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇastriśaṅkur mātaṅgādhipatimetadavocat— kathaṁ pṛthivyāṁ nāgāśca kena vā vinivāritāḥ |
divy33:3763: ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṁ subhikṣaṁ caiva prāṇinām |
divy33:3764: kastatra sa muniśreṣṭho nāma gotraṁ bravīhi me (1017)|
divy33:3765: daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ |
divy33:3766: yajñaṁ ca yajñabhāgaṁ ca hotavyaśca yathā baliḥ (1018)|
divy33:3767: pṛthivyāṁ daivataṁ brūhi āśrame daivataṁ brūhi |
divy33:3768: deve tu daivataṁ brūhi kena devī sā kalpitā (1019)|
divy33:3770: karake daivataṁ brūhi tathā sthālyāṁ ca daivatam (1020)|
divy33:3773: atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgādhipatirbrāhmaṇaṁ puṣkarasāriṇametadavocat— pṛthvī vā vāyurākāśamāpo jyotiśca pañcamam |
divy33:3774: tatra saṁvartate piṇḍaṁ tato meghaḥ pravartate (1022)|
divy33:3775: eṣa vyāpnoti cākāśaṁ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ |
divy33:3780: virodhanaṁ tu vāyośca agneśca anilasya ca (1025)|
divy33:3785: yatra satyaṁ ca dharmaśca havirmeghaśca vartate (1027)|
divy33:3789: pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhāstathā |
divy33:3794: dantāśanī tu sainyānāṁ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā |
divy33:3813: punarapi puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇastriśaṅkumevamāha— kimarthamāśrame nityaṁ hūyate havyavāhanaḥ |
divy33:3822: tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭisahasraśaḥ (1041)|
divy33:3826: tadāprabhṛti bhūtānāṁ dṛṣṭaṁ vai trāsitaṁ manaḥ (1043)|
divy33:3834: digbhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṁ teṣāmarthaṁ dine dine (1047)|
divy33:3837: sadhūmaṁ jvalitaṁ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṁ tu pāvakam |
divy33:3843: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṁs tithikarmanirdeśaṁ nāmādhyāyaṁ vyākhyāsyāmi |
divy33:3856: gṛhe kṣetre vivāhe vā āvāhakarmasu mitreti (1055)|
divy33:3857: bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte ’dhvani |
divy33:3858: nṛpāṇāṁ śāsane chatre śayyānāṁ karaṇeṣu ca (1056)|
divy33:3868: vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛhakarmasu pūjitā (1061)|
divy33:3869: jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitām |
divy33:3875: nandādīnāṁ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṁ tu madhyame |
divy33:3879: api ca mahābrāhmaṇa idaṁ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyāṁ vidyāyāṁ cittamabhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi, anekavidhapūrvanivāsaṁ samanusmarāmi |
divy33:3881: syātte brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṁ pravaro ’bhūt |
divy33:3883: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṁ pravaro ’bhūvam |
divy33:3888: mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ |
divy33:3893: syāttava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūt |
divy33:3895: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūvam |
divy33:3896: mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇavikā duhitā āsāditā bhāryārthāya |
divy33:3897: so ’haṁ tatra saṁraktacitta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ |
divy33:3898: so ’hamātmānaṁ jugupsamānastasyāṁ velāyāmimāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe—oṁ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ |
divy33:3902: so ’haṁ brāhmaṇa tvāṁ bravīmi—sāmānyasaṁjñāmātrakamidaṁ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā |
divy33:3904: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṁ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya |
divy33:3906: idaṁ ca vacanaṁ punaḥ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat— bhagavāñ śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhastvatto bhūyānna vidyate |
divy33:3908: putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṁ dadāmi śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ |
divy33:3909: śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtistu bhadrā ubhau rametāṁ rucitaṁ mamedam (1067)|
divy33:3910: tatra tāni pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni uccaiḥśabdāni procurmahāśabdāni—mā tvaṁ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṁ saṁbandhaṁ rocaya |
divy33:3911: nārhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṁ saṁbandhaṁ kartum |
divy33:3913: atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṁ nidānaṁ nidāya śabdaṁ saṁsthāpya nipatya ślokenaitānarthānabhāṣata— evametadyathā hyeṣa triśaṅkurbhāṣate giram |
divy33:3914: tattvaṁ hyavitathaṁ bhūtaṁ satyaṁ nityaṁ tathā dhruvam (1068)|
divy33:3915: atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṁ māṇavakānāṁ taṁ mahāntaṁ śabdaṁ saṁsthāpya triśaṅkuṁ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat—ayaṁ bhostriśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cātrumahābhaitiko mahāpuruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ |
divy33:3920: aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṁ cāsya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ |
divy33:3921: bhavāṁstu paramajño ’si tanme brūhi yathā tathā (1071)|
divy33:3922: iha bhostriśaṅko kimāha svalakṣaṇaṁ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva |
divy33:3923: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti |
divy33:3925: gacchanti sattvā bahugarbhayoniṁ na caiva kaścinmanujo hyayoniḥ |
divy33:3926: samastajātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutājjāyate kaścideva (1072)|
divy33:3928: sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaśca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hyapasmāriṇo ’pi (1073)|
divy33:3929: kṛṣṇāśca gaurāśca tathaiva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hyanyatame viśiṣṭāḥ |
divy33:3930: sahāsthicarmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṁsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtrapurīṣayuktāḥ |
divy33:3931: na cendriyāṇāṁ praviviktirasti tasmānna varṇāścaturo bhavanti (1074)|
divy33:3932: mantrairhi yadi labhyeta svargaṁ tu gamanaṁ dvijaḥ |
divy33:3936: māṇavakaśateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahāyaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo ’bravīt—brāhmaṇo ’sau mātaṅgarājo hi triśaṅkur nāma |
divy33:3942: jñānena hi tvaṁ parameṇa yuktaḥ sarveṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ |
divy33:3943: śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo ’si loke bhavān hi vidyācaraṇena yuktaḥ (1077)|
divy33:3944: dadāmi te ’haṁ prakṛtiṁ mamāmalāṁ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ |
divy33:3945: śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiśca bhadrā ubhau rametāṁ rucitaṁ mamedam (1078)|
divy33:3949: kṛtvā niveśaṁ sa tadātmajasya gatvāśrame ’sau nagaram yaśasvī |
divy33:3950: dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṁ kṣemaṁ subhikṣaṁ ca sadotsavāḍhyam (1080)|
divy33:3952: syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṁ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā—anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo ’bhūt? naivaṁ draṣṭavyam |
divy33:3953: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo ’bhūvam |
divy33:3954: syādevaṁ ca bhikṣavo yuṣmākam—anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śādūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro ’bhūt |
divy33:3956: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro ’bhūt |
divy33:3957: syādevam yuṣmākam—anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo ’bhūt |
divy33:3959: eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo ’bhūt |
divy33:3960: nānyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt |
divy33:3962: eṣā sā prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt |
divy33:3963: sā etarhi tenaiva snehena tenaiva premṇā ānandaṁ bhikṣuṁ gacchantamanugacchati tiṣṭhantamanutiṣṭhati |
divy33:3964: yadyadeva kulaṁ piṇḍāya praviśati, tatra tatraiva dvāre tūṣṇīmbhūtā asthāt |
divy33:3966: atha khalu bhagavānetasminnidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṁ velāyāmimāṁ gāthāmabhāṣata— parvakeṇa nivāsena pratyutpannena tena ca |
divy33:3967: etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā (1081)|
divy33:3968: tasmāttarhi bhikṣavo ’nabhisamitānāṁ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhisamayāya, adhimātraṁ vīryaṁ tīvracchando vīryaṁ śabdāpayāmi |
divy33:3971: drutameṣāṁ caturṇāṁ duḥkhasyāryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya nirodhasya nirodhagāminyāḥ pratipada āryasatyasya amīṣāṁ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmanabhisamitānāmabhisamayāya adhimātraṁ tīvracchando vīryaṁ vyāyāma utsāha unnatiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṁprajanyenāpramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
divy33:3973: asmiṁśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṁ ṣaṣṭimātrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāani vimuktāni |
divy33:3974: saṁbahulānāṁ śrāvakāṇāṁ brahmaṇāṁ gṛhapatīnāṁ ca virajaskaṁ vigatamalaṁ dharmacakṣurudapādi viśuddham |
